revision.text: {{also|xī'àn|Xian|xián|xiàn|xiān|xiǎn|Xi'an|Xī'ān|xī'ān}} ==English== ===Etymology 1=== From the [[pinyin]] romanization of {{bor|en|cmn|-}} {{zh-m|縣}}. {{wikipedia|County (China)|Counties in China}} ====Alternative forms==== * {{alter|en|hsien||archaic}} ====Noun==== {{en-noun}} # {{lb|en|China}} An [[administrative]] [[subdivision]] of [[imperial]], [[republican]], and [[communist]] [[China]] [[roughly]] [[equivalent]] to [[county|counties]], [[now]] [[distinguish]]ed from the [[more]] [[urban]] "[[district]]s" ([[qu]]). #: {{syn|en|county}} #* {{quote-book |en |year=1987 |last=Rawson |first=Jessica |authorlink=Jessica Rawson |chapter=The Eastern Zhou Period |title=Chinese Bronzes: Art and Ritual |url=https://archive.org/details/chinesebronzesar00raws/ |publisher={{w|British Museum Publications}} |ISBN=0-7141-1439-1 |OCLC=1183919119 |page=47 |pageurl=https://archive.org/details/chinesebronzesar00raws/page/47/ |text=Tight and dense motifs occur on bronzes excavated in 1923 from a tomb at Lijialou at Xinzheng<!--新鄭--> '''Xian''' in southern Henan attributed to the small state of Zheng.}} =====Derived terms===== * {{l|en|Gui Xian}} ===Etymology 2=== An alternative capitalization of [[Xian]]. ====Noun==== {{en-noun}} # {{lb|en|sometimes|_|pejorative|_|or|_|offensive}} {{alt form|en|Xian|nodot=a}}: [[Christian]]. ====Adjective==== {{en-adj|-}} # {{lb|en|sometimes|_|pejorative|_|or|_|offensive}} {{alt form|en|Xian|nodot=a}}: [[Christian]]. #* {{quote-book |en |year=1993 |title=The Selected Letters of Mary Moody Emerson |first=Mary Moody |last=Emerson |authorlink=Mary Moody Emerson |editor=Simmons, Nancy Craig |publisher=University of Georgia Press |location=Athens |page=242 |pageurl=http://books.google.com/books?id=GbviVhvwUpoC&pg=PA242&dq=xian |passage=But what an epoch in the xian world—what a time for a xian Orator to make a deep & eternal impression on socity{{SIC}}. }} ====References==== * [http://www.infidels.org/library/modern/mathew/arguments.html#xian What does 'xian' mean?] ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=ainx|Axin|Naxi|axin}} [[Category:en:Christianity]] ---- ==Mandarin== ===Romanization=== {{cmn-pinyin|notr=1}} # {{nonstandard spelling of|cmn|sc=Latn|xiān}} # {{nonstandard spelling of|cmn|sc=Latn|xián}} # {{nonstandard spelling of|cmn|sc=Latn|xiǎn}} # {{nonstandard spelling of|cmn|sc=Latn|xiàn}} ====Usage notes==== * {{cmn-toneless-note}}
